# NetworkMode enumeration

The game object network mode

```csharp
public enum NetworkMode
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| SERVER | `0` | Game object is an server object |
| CLIENT | `1` | Game object is an local object |
| PUPPET | `2` | Game object is an local object as puppet |
